entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
